item.title: How to make 1 person per IP
item.dc:creator: @Rustyz Rustyz
item.description:
@Rustyz wrote:

IM getting alot of spammers on my ddsspecs source and I thought that wouldnt happen because it was deltabased but, how do I make it 1 person 1 ip.

[code] public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}

public boolean checkHost(String host) {
	for (String h : banned) {
		if (h.equals(host))
			return false;
	}
	int num = 0;
	for (String h : connections) {
		if (host.equals(h)) {
			num++;
		}
	}
	if (num > 1) {
		banHost(host, num);
		return false;
	}

	if (checkLog("ipbans", host)) {
		System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!");
		return false; // ip ban added by bakatool
	}
	return true;
}

[/code]

if (num > 1) {
banHost(host, num);
return false;
}

would that do it?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make 1 person per IP
